r.s: immutable_cache - an shared memory cache of immutable values
r.d: immutable_cache - an shared memory cache of immutable values. Based on APCu.
r.n: - Extend minimum supported php version from php 8.0 to 7.2 - Work around bug adding '-lpthread' as a shared library dependency in php before 7.4.14. Related to https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=80402 - Switch default for immutable_cache.serializer to "default" (store the php arrays and strings and scalars in shared memory rather than serialization when added value is an array)
